price: 31. Maar iedereen die meer zoekt dan dezen, dan zijn zij degenen die tot de overtreders behoren.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
